title: Downtown 2-Bedroom near CMA
posting_body: ['Welcome to Scarlett Place', 'Rental Information', 'Pricing:', '$1382/Month | 1 Bedroom 1 Bath | 722 sq ft', 'Lease Term:', '6-Month, 10-Month, 11-Month, 12-Month, 13-Month', 'show contact info', 'Apartment Amenities', '● Air Conditioning', '● Cable Ready', '● Carpeting', '● Ceiling Fans', '● Dining Room', '● Dishwasher', '● Disposal', '● Extra Storage', '● Patio/Balcony', '● Range', '● All-Electric GE Appliances', '● Breakfast Bar', '● Cable/Satellite Available', '● Crown Molding', '● Deck', '● Double Vanities', '● Hardwood Floors', '● High Speed Internet Access', '● Vaulted Ceilings', '● Walk-In Closets', 'Community Features', '● Controlled Access', '● Fitness Center', '● Gated Community', '● Parking', '● Picnic Area', '● Pool', '● Business Center', '● Double Vanity', '● Garages', '● Garden Tubs', '● Maintenance on site', '● Multi Use Room', '● Online Services', '● Property Manager on Site', '● Public Transportation', '● Sundeck', 'About Community', 'Description:', 'Welcome to Scarlett Place, a residential community featuring One, Two & Three bedroom apartments in Jonesboro, GA.', 'Spacious layouts and amenities welcome you home, along with exceptional service and an ideal location within walking distance to shopping, dining and entertainment options.', 'Are you looking for an apartment for rent in Jonesboro, GA?', 'Contact our friendly, professional office staff to schedule a tour today.', 'Location:', '3500 Summercourt Dr', 'Jonesboro, GA 30236', 'show contact info', 'Office Hours:', 'Mon - Fri: 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM', 'Sat: 10:00 AM - 5:00 PM', 'Sun: 1:00 PM - 5:00 PM', 'Additional Information', 'Pet Policy:', 'A maximum of 2 pet per unit shall be accepted.', 'The pet fee is $300 Non-Refundable per pet.', 'A pet addendum must be completed and pet fees must be paid prior to moving in.', 'If there is more than one pet per unit, the combined weight of the 2 pets cannot exceed 50lbs.', 'Website:', '<URL>/', 'Our Management Company:', 'Ventron Management', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', '562B8D6B88794A78']
